user_description: Spend life with whom makes you happy, not the one who you have to impress.
Even a small star shines in the darkness.
In me the tiger sniffs the rose
Two Roads Diverged in a Wood, and I Took the One Less Traveled by.
Why do we fall,dear?So that we can learn to pick ourselves up.
